issues.details: Gallup reported a 36% approval rating (lowest since inauguration), Ipsos 38%, and Economist 31% positive response, all indicating a steep decline in support largely attributed to economic concerns and high inflation.

evaluations.opinion: Approval rating at 36%, the lowest since Trumpâ€™s inauguration.
Approval rating at 38%, the lowest in his second term.
Positive response 31%, negative 57%, reflecting a sharp drop in perceived governance.

confirmed_facts: Gallup survey (Decâ€¯1â€¯2025) showed a 36% approval rating with a Â±4% margin of error.
Ipsos survey (Decâ€¯1â€¯2025) showed a 38% approval rating with a Â±3% margin of error.
Economist survey (Decâ€¯1â€¯2025) showed a 31% positive response and 57% negative response.

timeline.event: Trumpâ€™s inauguration; approval rating in the 40s.
Ipsos survey: 38% approval (lowest in second term).
Economist survey: 31% positive response, 57% negative response.
